text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to explicitly mention that the EUTM can be converted to national filings even after the original opposition period has passed (e.g., \u201cthe EUTM can be converted into national filings after the 3-month opposition period\u201d). The candidate answer mentions conversion: \"if there\u2019s a successful objection/opposition/invalidity based on rights in *any* EU country, the **whole EUTM can be refused/cancelled** (though you can often \u201cconvert\u201d to national filings\u2014usually at extra cost)\".
